name: PackageRun
description: A challenging platformer that looks easy to play on the surface. You play as a computer screen defeating enemies, going through hard to navigate levels, defeating bosses and collecting upgrades to get stronger and play better.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Dual core processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 405 or better Storage: 50 MB available space
